channel.title: Modest mouse && other bands I like
channel.description:
Intro: This is the music I listen to; I don't care if you don't like it, everyone has different tastes.
So first I'd like to ask if anyone here listens to modest mouse and your opinion on them? I only found them a few days ago but I've really enjoyed all the songs I've found by them so far.
In case you don't know modest mouse and want to listen go here: http://www.dizzler.com/music/Modest_Mouse
My personal favourite is "Missed the boat".
And lastly I've been compiling a list of all bands I like, when I get a bigger hard drive I will probably download all of their discographies. What I'd like is if anyone could suggest any other bands which you assume I might enjoy after looking at the bands I like. Here is the list so far:
(In no particular order)
Yellow card The used System of a down Mindless self indulgence My Chemical romance Blink 182 The redjumpsuit apparatus The postal service Skillet Lost prophets Angels and Airwaves Serj Tankian Linkin park Death cab for cutie taking back sunday wheatus I am ghost Coheed and Cambria Modest Mouse Flogging molly Less than jake nofx

item.title: Modest mouse && other bands I like
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Speljohan:

http://youtube.com/watch?v=nofQB4Lyg9o Like it or die pls.

Listened to it, liked it a lot. Can’t find many songs by them but heck I haven’t searched much yet.

jme:

They were cool for a short time. I would like to see a new album or something though.

Who are you reffering to? Johans link or modest mouse?

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Not X A Alex:

Same here, I like most those bands, Cept you don’t have minus the bear on there

I listened to some minus the bear and they are pretty good, though not going to put them on my list as I wouldn’t listen to them I don’t think.
